function_call.name: get_risks
function_call.arguments: {"risks":[{"Description":"Introduction of new disinfection technologies may lead to improper implementation and potential errors in operation","Impact":"Increased risk of incomplete disinfection and potential spread of contagious diseases","Mitigation":"Comprehensive training and education for facility staff, regular inspection and maintenance of equipment","Technologies":"Training programs, inspection checklists, equipment maintenance protocols","People":"Hospital staff, waste management personnel","Owner":"Hospital management, waste management authorities"},{"Description":"Inconsistent sterilization temperatures and fluctuation ranges may compromise the effectiveness of high temperature steam disinfection","Impact":"Risk of ineffective disinfection and survival of pathogens in hospital wastes","Mitigation":"Calibration of sterilization equipment, monitoring of temperature, and humidity during the disinfection process","Technologies":"Temperature and humidity sensors, automated sterilization control systems","People":"Sterilization equipment operators, maintenance technicians","Owner":"Hospital management, sterilization equipment suppliers"},{"Description":"Low volume reduction rate and generation of toxic volatile organic compounds during high temperature steam disinfection","Impact":"Environmental and health hazards from toxic emissions","Mitigation":"Implementation of exhaust gas treatment systems, strict adherence to emission regulations, and use of alternative disinfection methods","Technologies":"Exhaust gas treatment systems, emission monitoring equipment","People":"Environmental regulators, facility managers, local communities","Owner":"Environmental protection agencies, hospital management"}]}
